title: Family 'devastated' by death sentence on British national by pro-Russian court in Ukraine
content:
1. Family 'devastated' by death sentence on British national by pro-Russian court in Ukraine  CNN
  2. Zelensky says 'death sentences' against foreigners who fought for Ukraine a signal to the world’s ‘conditional pacifists’  Yahoo News
  3. Ukraine: UK man's family 'devastated' by death sentence  NPR
  4. Family of British man facing the death penalty in Donbas call for his release  Reuters UK
  5. Russia-Ukraine war: ‘intense street fighting’ in Sievierodonetsk; family of Briton sentenced to death speak out – live  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ウクライナの親ロシア派裁判所による英国人への死刑判決に「打ちのめされた」家族
乌克兰亲俄法院判处英国人死刑，家人感到 "悲痛"。
烏克蘭親俄法院判處英國人死刑，家人感到 "悲痛"。
